item.title: Series 1: Bad science
item.description: For a light start in the field of evidence based science Goldacre’s Bad science is a good and enjoyable read. Bad science wiki page Order Bad science from amazon Goldacre is a British physician, academic and Guardian columnist, very enjoyable to read, though provocative. An interesting follow up is Goldacre’s Bad Pharma, more closely oriented to the world of drug development.
